[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”39027″ img_size=”1200×450″ qode_css_animation=””][vc_column_text el_class=”page-title-overlap”]

COOPERATION PROTOCOLS

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575835851507{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1580398401015{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section curved-bottom-right space16″]

Recognizing the multifaceted importance of networking and collaboration at both national and international levels, UNIPA has developed important initiatives to promote synergies with educational institutions, as well as public and private organizations. Synergies are sealed through the signing of Cooperation Protocols, which aim to strengthen scientific and technological cooperation on the basis of equality and mutual benefit of the parties involved.

The development of communication channels and synergies with educational institutions, public and private sector organizations in Greece and abroad, contribute to boosting the quality of research activity, disseminating research results, transferring know-how practices and substantially enhancing the status of UNIPA as an international research and advisory center.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
